Package com.microsoft.band.tiles.pages

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Barcode
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band barcode layout element
    BarcodeData
    Class that represents the data required to populate a Microsoft Band barcode layout element
    FilledButton
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band filled button layout element
    FilledButtonData
    Class that represents the data required to populate a Microsoft Band filled button layout element
    FilledPanel
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band basic container layout element (Should only be used at the root of a layout)
    FlowPanel
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band auto-arranging container layout element
    Icon
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band icon layout element
    IconData
    Class that represents the data required to populate a Microsoft Band icon layout element
    Margins
    Class that represents the margins of a Microsoft Band layout element
    PageData
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band tile page
    PageElement<T extends PageElement<T>>
    Base class for Microsoft Band layout elements
    PageElementData
    Base for the data element classes required for populating Microsoft Band layout elements
    PageLayout
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band tile layout
    PagePanel<T extends PagePanel<T>>
    Base class for Microsoft Band container layout elements
    PageRect
    Class that represents the x and y location of the upper left corner of a Microsoft Band layout element, relative to its parent element, as well as its width and height
    ScrollFlowPanel
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band scrollable auto-arranging container layout element
    TextBlock
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band text block layout element
    TextBlockData
    Class that represents the data required to populate a Microsoft Band text block layout element
    TextButton
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band text button layout element
    TextButtonData
    Class that represents the data required to populate a Microsoft Band text button layout element
    TextData
    Base for the data element classes required for populating text-including Microsoft Band layout elements
    WrappedTextBlock
    Class that represents a Microsoft Band wrapped text block layout element
    WrappedTextBlockData
    Class that represents the data required to populate a Microsoft Band wrapped text block layout element
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BarcodeType
    Enumeration of barcode types
    ElementColorSource
    Enumeration of color sources for Microsoft Band layout elements
    FlowPanelOrientation
    Enumeration of flow panel orientations
    HorizontalAlignment
    Enumeration of how a layout element should horizontally align its content
    TextBlockBaselineAlignment
    Enumeration of text baseline options for text in a TextBlock layout element
    TextBlockFont
    Enumeration of font types for the Microsoft Band text block layout element
    VerticalAlignment
    Enumeration of how a layout element should vertically align its content
    WrappedTextBlockFont
    Enumeration of font types for the Microsoft Band wrapped text block layout element
